background: Seeks broad-appeal factual entertainment and emotionally resonant series for mainstream Finnish audiences, emphasising accessibility and character-led storytelling.
thematic_priorities: Factual entertainment formats and returnable series
True crime and mystery with Finnish relevance
content_not_wanted: Overly niche or artistic projects with limited commercial appeal
One-offs without potential for broad audience reach
technical_requirements: Clear episodic structures; adaptable for MTV Katsomo (streaming)
name: Elina Hirvonen
